post.title: fs: bnib t-mobile samsung vibrant galaxy unlocked - wind mobile / t-mobile
post.content: hello for sale: brand new in box samsung vibrant unlocked - tmobile 14gb of memory onboard + 2gb microsd card price: $500 cad--- firm! pm for pickup, located around dvp eglinton (evenings only) listed on ebay as well, if you prefer ebay let me know
